description: This is a home that works for real life. Enter from the lower level with a proper mudroom & nook, then head up to a bright, open main floor where the kitchen, dining, and living space flow togetherâ€”perfect for everyday living and easy hosting. Fresh paint, laminate flooring, quartz counters, island seating & stainless steel appliances keep things clean and modern, with a balcony off the dining area for BBQs or quiet evenings. A 2-pc powder room completes the main floor. Upstairs offers side-by-side laundry with extra storage & carpeted bedrooms. Rare parking for 4 vehicles with a double garage + driveway! Fronting 240th St makes commuting simple, with transit nearby. Walk to schools, parks, and trails in this family-friendly East Maple Ridge location.
